channel.title: CVE Feed for Red Hat -- NETWORK-OBSERVABILITY-1.1.0-RHEL-8
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Red Hat -- NETWORK-OBSERVABILITY-1.1.0-RHEL-8

item.title: CVE-2023-0813|2024-07-15T00:27:54.327174Z -- red%20hat -- network-observability-1.1.0-rhel-8
item.description: A flaw was found in the Network Observability plugin for OpenShift console. Unless the Loki authToken configuration is set to FORWARD mode, authentication is no longer enforced, allowing any user who can connect to the OpenShift Console in an OpenShift cluster to retrieve flows without authentication.
